scenario_text.value:
Hmm... I thought we could find something in
the cafeteria, but that was wishful thinking.
No food then?
It looks like there’s nothing here.
You’re looking for food?

Yes... I guess if push comes to shove, we’ll
have to take our search outdoors.

Don’t worry, Aoi! When the time comes I’ll be
sure to protect you!
Thank you, Labramon...
(That might put Aoi in danger...)
I’ll look out for you.
Don’t go on your own.
I’ll look out for you, too, Aoi.
...Thanks, Takuma.

Then we’ll see who protects her better, won’t
we?!
Me, too!

Well... Let’s hope there’s nothing to protect
me from in the first place, okay?
No, you can’t do that!
Takuma?

It’s too risky for you to go out alone.
We should all go!

Yeah, you’re right.
It would be safer with all of us.
But isn’t it pointless if we all look?
Yeah, that’s what I figured.

It’s okay. Haru and Miyuki are here.
There’s gotta be food in the school.

Oh yeah, there wasn’t any food, but I did
find this.

I’m sure you could use this more effectively
than I would, Takuma.
Wow, are you sure?
Yeah. You take it.
Hurray! Nice one, Takuma!
Yeek!

What? A message? That doesn’t... I thought we
didn’t have a signal?

Is it a bunch of garbled text? I got the same
kind of message.

Huh... Yeah, it is. Doesn’t look like I can
send messages from my side, either.
What is this? It’s kinda spooky...

Can’t worry about that now. The search for
supplies comes first.
Oh, by the way!

Haru told me there might be food in the
storage at the back of the gym.
Really?! Let’s hurry and check!

There’s food in the gym?
Let’s go see!
What is it, Takuma?
